basic_info.description: üëã I'm Juan Ramirez. I'm working with newest front-end framework React. Currently, I focus on creating, testing & improving my work. I typically use HTML/CSS and React for responsive websites and Nodejs, Express, Mongodb on server-side applications via REST.‚≠ê

projects.title: Mileage Expense Tracker
projects.description: Log & track business-related travel expenses with access to precise mapping through a mobile/pc friendly interface to create your drives before tax season. Full Stack (MERN) website integrated with REST. Features include secure user registration through One-click w/ OAuth 2.0 via google or JSON Web Token (JWT), Google Maps API for rendering map data and directions, CSS framework Material UI to create a responsive styled UI, and Export feature to print/download into CSV to file or compile with other data.

projects.title: ECommerce Store
projects.description: Shopper can browse through products, make a purchase, and view their order history with a mobile/pc friendly interface. This full stack (MERN) website is integrated with REST. Main features include secure user registration through One-click w/ OAuth 2.0 via google or JSON Web Token (JWT), Role Base Access to handle permissions for sensitive information such as viewing sales chart data and create/delete/edit products. This website is styled via CSS framework Material UI for responsiveness.
